attributes.action: Take up the post of an Ambassador to Iraq for 6 months, with the same protection afforded to our troops there
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I request that due to his long awaited retirement, the Prime Minister (Rt Hon Tony Blair MP) take up the position of an ambassador to the Basra/Baghdad areas of Iraq, giving him chance to fulfil what he failed to produce during his term in office. I request that Mr Blair be afforded only the same amount of protection given to any member of the Armed Forces, regardless of rank or status, during his period in theatre and that living conditions are commensurate with the members of the Forces.
